South Africa won the game by 8 wickets, taking a 1-0 lead in the two-match series.
Ryan Rickelton won the Player of the Match award for his stunning knock of 76 runs.
Aiden Markram and Matthew Breetzke guided South Africa to victory with 14 balls to spare.
Patrick Kruger stood out with the ball for South Africa with his four-wicket haul.
Ross Adair gave Ireland a quick start, but they kept losing wickets at regular intervals.
Curtis Campher's 49 gave Ireland a boost, but they lost wickets in the death overs.
Craig Young dismissed Reeza Hendricks, and Mark Adair dismissed Ryan Rickelton, giving Ireland hope.
